scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:unminified && npm run build:css:minified
scripts.clean:css: npm run clean:css:unminified && npm run clean:css:minified
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css:unminified & npm run build:css:minified
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar '*.html' -c 'npm run build:html'
scripts.watch:css:unminified: npm run build:css:unminified && chokidar 'css/**/*.less' -c 'npm run build:css:unminified'
scripts.watch:css:minified: npm run build:css:minified && chokidar 'css/**/*.less' -c 'npm run build:css:minified'
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:minified && npm run build:js:unminified
scripts.watch:js: npm run watch:js:minified && npm run watch:js:unminified
scripts.clean:js: npm run clean:js:minified && npm run clean:js:unminified
